item.title: The Real AI Risk Nobody Told You About | Sahil Bloom
item.description:
The Real AI Risk Nobody Told You About

4 principles (and clear rules) to protect myself from AI Brain:

Principle 1: Embrace First-Pass Thinking

  • I think before I prompt.
  • I write before I refine.
  • I decide before I optimize.

Principle 2: Preserve Cognitive Friction

  • I allow boredom to exist.
  • I seek out solitude.
  • I sit with problems longer than feels efficient.
  • I slow down my thinking

Principle 3: Do Less, But Deeper

  • I identify the 2-3 most important things.
  • I say no to most ideas.
  • I measure quality, not quantity.

Principle 4: Do More Human Things

  • I prioritize in-person interaction.
  • I do physically hard things.

item.title: The Hercules Principle | Sahil Bloom
item.description:
The Hercules Principle

No one is coming to save you. No one will fix your problems. No one will change your mindsets. No one will hand you the things you want in life.

It’s just you. It’s all on you.

Contrary to what your first reaction to this may be, it’s not morbid or depressing. It’s empowering. Even inspiring.

The Hercules Principle is a reminder that you are in control. Don’t look out. Look in. You have within you everything you need…
